    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:natecaji/pic602</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic602</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Toča</string>
            <string language="en">Hail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hagel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grêle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saraiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La grandine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαλάζι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El granizo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tudi voda je lahko trda in boleča.</string>
            <string language="en">When the circumstances are right a rain drop can be transformed into ice and its called hail.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dež</string>
            <string language="en">rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toča</string>
            <string language="en">hail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vreme</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nevihta</string>
            <string language="en">storm</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn die Umstände recht sind, kann ein 
Regentropfen in Eis und in seinen benannten Hagel umgewandelt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand les circonstances sont exactes une baisse de
pluie peut être transformée en glace et son grêle appelée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando as circunstâncias são direitas uma gota 
da chuva pode ser transformada no gelo e em sua saraiva chamada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando le circostanze sono di destra una goccia 
della pioggia può essere trasformata in ghiaccio e nella relativa 
grandine chiamata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όταν οι περιστάσεις είναι σωστές μια απελευθέρωση 
βροχής μπορεί να μετασχηματιστεί στον πάγο και το αποκαλούμενο 
χαλάζι της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuando las circunstancias correctas una gota de la
lluvia se puede transformar en el hielo y el su granizo llamado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hagel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sturm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pluie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grêle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">survivez à</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">donnez l'assaut à</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chuva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">saraiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempestade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pioggia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la grandine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempesta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βροχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαλάζι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καιρός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θύελλα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lluvia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el granizo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tormenta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
